${ModID}:BagPipes.NAME: Bag Pipes
DESCRIPTIONS: Each card you play may also #y${ModID}:Queue #y${ModID}:Notes. The #y${ModID}:Notes #y${ModID}:Queued depend on the type of the card played and are shown in the card's tooltips.

${ModID}:PitchPipe.NAME: Pitch Pipe
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #y${ModID}:Queue a [BuffNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].

${ModID}:SelfPlayingFlute.NAME: Self-Playing Flute
${ModID}:SelfPlayingFlute.FLAVOR: A magical flute, enchanted to play songs on its own.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL #y${ModID}:Queued #y${ModID}:Notes are carried over between combats.

${ModID}:StrangeHarp.NAME: Strange Harp
${ModID}:StrangeHarp.FLAVOR: Every note played on this harp sounds eerie.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any #yWeak or #yVulnerable it has to a random enemy.

${ModID}:DeepVero.NAME: Deep Vero
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Clear your Note Queue at the end of each turn.

${ModID}:ConductorsBaton.NAME: Conductor's Baton
${ModID}:ConductorsBaton.FLAVOR: Beatings will continue until the music improves.

${ModID}:MagicTuningFork.NAME: Magic Tuning Fork
${ModID}:MagicTuningFork.FLAVOR: A memento of your past life. Rings with the sound of a constantly changing note.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #y${ModID}:Queue a [WildNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].

${ModID}:OilPainting.NAME: Oil Painting
${ModID}:OilPainting.FLAVOR: This painting depicts a group of people standing on a stage together. They feel oddly familiar to you.
